Package cellularAutomata.util

Class Summary
Arrow Creates an arrow Shape.
AttentionPanel A JPanel that draws a message with color gradient paint to catch the user's attention.
CAFileChooser A file chooser that includes a workaround for java bug 6317789 that does not handle shortcuts properly when choosing a folder in the JFileChooser's drop down menu.
CAHyperlinkListener A listener for hyperlink events.
CAToolTip A tool tip with the ability to change color.
Coordinate Holds a pair of points representing the row and column of an array.
Debug Strictly for debugging.
EquilateralTriangle An equilateral triangle that can be drawn by a Graphics object (using the Graphics method drawPolygon or fillPolygon).
Fonts Creates fonts suitable for the CA graphics.
GBC This class simplifies the use of the GridBagConstraints class.
Hexagon A hexagon that can be drawn by a Graphics object (using the Graphics method drawPolygon or fillPolygon).
ImagePreviewer Displays an image file in a JLabel.
MemoryManagementTools A collection of handy methods for memory management.
MinMaxBigIntPair Stores two BigIntegers, a minimum and a maximum.
MinMaxIntPair Stores two integers, a minimum and a maximum.
MinMaxPair Stores two doubles, a minimum and a maximum.
MultilineLabel Same as a label, but works for multiple lines with auto-wrapping.
PackageNameTools Handy tools for working with packages.
PanelSize Holds a pair of points representing the width and height of a JPanel.
PreviewPanel Creates a panel for previewing an image.
SimplePlot Plots data passed in as an array of Points.
SwingWorker This is the 3rd version of SwingWorker (also known as SwingWorker 3), an abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated thread.
ToolTipComboBox Creates a combo box that uses a tool tip.
ToolTipLatticeComboBox Create a combo box with tooltips that come from the selected lattice.
